name: LOK KALYAN SAMAJ SEVI SANSTHA SAMITI
briefDescription: Lok Kalyan Rural Development Society was established in Jan. 2014 promoted by team of technocrat. Organization is working with socially and economically oppressed primitive tribal community, Sheriya. The operational area of organization falls in Distt. Morena Block of Pahadgarh, Morena district of Madhya Pradesh. These blocks are in the fifth schedule area formed as per provisions of the Indian Constitution. Empowering community based organization and work with them for sustainable development especially by managing local resources are major concerns of the organizations. Vision of Lok Kalyan: Empowering community-based organization aimed at creating sustainable livelihood through need based interventions based on participation and equ
